events.message: We have received the application for the Software Engineer role submitted by the candidate on the company career portal.
The candidate's profile has been reviewed and categorised under the Engineering department focusing on software development and backend systems.
Recruiter assigned to the case has reached out to the candidate to schedule the initial screening call.
Completed initial screening interview with the candidate to evaluate technical skills and cultural fit for the engineering team.
Candidate responded promptly and positively to the interview feedback and expressed eagerness to proceed to the technical interview stage.
Scheduled the technical interview for the candidate to assess coding ability, system design knowledge, and problem-solving skills.
